title: Oval ornament frames
content:
Hello I'm looking for a little help...

I'm designing a flyer for an art exhibition called Sideshow. The main type will be set with JFRingmaster and the flyer will resemble an old circus poster, with portraits of the four artists. I'm really keen to find some graphics or a font with oval ornament frames for the portraits (they're all dressed up too), but I'm having trouble doing so. Can anyone help me?

Thanks from Louise

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120119050156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sideshow_6054.gif)
author: Louise H

comments.content: You might be able to get by with modifying and expanding that O in your JFRingmaster.

Have you tried this [Adobe Exchange](http://web.archive.org/web/20120119050156/http:/www.adobe.com/cfusion/exchange/?ogn=EN_US-gntray_comm_exchange_home)? There are oval frames in shapes and brushes here.

Sharon
Have you tried searching for EPS images or Vector Images? There are a ton of websites with stuff similar to what you are looking for, if I understand the question correctly...?
